text: Ra hamile yiniharu(yahudiharu) pachi isa bina mariyamala'i pathayaum, jinale ki aphubhanda agadiko kitaba tauratala'i pramanita gardathe ra hamile unala'i injila pradana garyaum jasama ki margadarsana ra prakasa thiyo ra tyasale pahilako kitaba tauratala'i pramanita gardathyo ra parahejagaraharuka lagi tyo margadarsana evam upadesa thiyo
